name: Archaica: The Path of Light
description: Archaica is an atmospheric puzzler with lasers and mirrors, that introduces a mystical and ancient world, full of challenging puzzles. In this game, we become the Light Bearer who is sent on a quest to walk the legendary Path of Light and save the world from impending disaster.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 Storage: 800 MB available space
